alert.note: Alert for Bee; Live Oak (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 7:41PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Live Oak and west central Bee Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 741 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Karon, or 8 miles east of Three Rivers, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mineral, Oakville, Normanna, Ray Point, Karon and Tuleta. This includes the following highways... Interstate 37 between mile markers 64 and 65. US Highway 181 between mile markers 580 and 586. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
